alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson County through 645 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Skyline, or 16 miles north of Scottsboro, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Skyline, Hytop, Estillfork, Jericho, and Larkin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
